Circle.description: Construct a circle by its center and a point on it

Line.description: Construct a line through two points

Ray.description: Construct a ray from the first point and through the second point

Intersect.description: Construct an intersection of two objects

Segment.description: Construct a segment between two points

Linepoint.description: Construct a point on the line or circle

EdgePoint.description: Construct an infinite point of a line

CenterPoint.description: Construct the center of a circle

Midpoint.description: Construct the middle point between two points

Perp.description: Construct the perpendicular line through a point

Parallel.description: Construct the parallel line through a point

ABisect.description: Construct the angle bisect line by its vertex and two points on its side

PBisect.description: Construct the perpendicular bisect line between two points

ShiftSeg.description: Copy an equal parallel segment to a new point

Compass.description: Copy an equal circle to a new center

FixAngle.description: Construct a fixed angle ray on a line

CopyAngle.description: Copy an equal angle ray on a new line

Tangent.description: Construct a tangent line about a circle from a point

PolarLine.description: Construct the polar line of a point about a circle

PolarPoint.description: Construct the polar point of a line about a circle

PointA.description: Construct the point A in canvas

PointB.description: Construct the point B in canvas
